description.english: Prove yourself stronger than Bass and complete Mega Man 7.
description.japanese: 「ロックマン７」をクリアしよう。
description.german: Beweise, dass du stärker als Bass bist, und schließe Mega Man 7 ab.
description.french: Soyez plus fort que Bass et complétez Mega Man 7.
description.italian: Dimostra di essere migliore di Bass e completa Mega Man 7.
description.spanish: Demuestra que eres superior a Bass y completa Mega Man 7.
description.tchinese: 「洛克人７」全部通關

description.english: Eliminate the Evil Energy and complete Mega Man 8.
description.japanese: 「ロックマン８」をクリアしよう。
description.german: Vernichte die "Böse Energie" und schließe Mega Man 8 ab.
description.french: Éliminez l'énergie maléfique et complétez Mega Man 8.
description.italian: Elimina l'Energia malvagia e completa Mega Man 8.
description.spanish: Elimina la energía maléfica y completa Mega Man 8.
description.tchinese: 「洛克人８」全部通關

description.english: Liberate Dr. Light and complete Mega Man 9.
description.japanese: 「ロックマン９」をクリアしよう。
description.german: Befreie Dr. Light und schließe Mega Man 9 ab.
description.french: Libérez Dr. Light et complétez Mega Man 9.
description.italian: Salva il Dr. Light e completa Mega Man 9.
description.spanish: Libera al Dr. Light y completa Mega Man 9.
description.tchinese: 「洛克人９」全部通關

displayName.spanish: El resurgir de la ambición (Proto Man)

description.english: Use Proto Man to liberate Dr. Light and complete Mega Man 9.
description.japanese: 「ロックマン９」をブルースでクリアしよう。
description.german: Befreie Dr. Light mit Proto Man und schließe Mega Man 9 ab.
description.french: Libérez Dr. Light et complétez Mega Man 9 avec Proto Man.
description.italian: Salva il Dr. Light e completa Mega Man 9 usando Proto Man.
description.spanish: Usa a Proto Man para liberar al Dr. Light y completa Mega Man 9.
description.tchinese: 「洛克人９」以布魯斯全部通關

description.english: Cure the Roboenza and complete Mega Man 10.
description.japanese: 「ロックマン１０」をクリアしよう。
description.german: Heile die Roboenza und schließe Mega Man 10 ab.
description.french: Surmontez la Roboenza et complétez Mega Man 10.
description.italian: Trova una cura per il virus Roboenza e completa Mega Man 10.
description.spanish: Cura la Roboenza y completa Mega Man 10.
description.tchinese: 「洛克人１０」全部通關

description.english: Earn 1 bronze medal by completing a challenge.
